content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'adlsnyc-himani-singh_udstorageacc_dfs_core_windows_net') 
  CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [adlsnyc-himani-singh_udstorageacc_dfs_core_windows_net] 
  WITH (
      LOCATION = 'abfss://adlsnyc-himani-singh@udstorageacc.dfs.core.windows.net' 
  )
GO
